articles.summary: The Kansas GOP cannot have it both ways. It cannot claim to despise racism and homophobia while turning a blind eye to both. .

articles.title: Cinnabon Employee Fired After Admitting To Being Racist In Viral Social Media Video
articles.full_text: The Cinnabon employee used the n-word and made obscene gestures while saying, “I am racist and I'll say it to the whole entire world ... “The racism in ...
